useCase.name: Negotiation Pattern Sequence
useCase.description: A use case describing the negotiation pattern sequence between Acquirer and Provider

preconditions.precondition: An initial offer is strictly required, though in practice, it is expected OFFERs will precede a REQUEST.

successEndConditions.condition: An acknowledgement the MATTER was received.

mainSequence.step: Acquirer sends an OFFER to Provider
Provider receives the OFFER from Acquirer
Acquirer sends a REQUEST to Provider
Provider receives the REQUEST from Acquirer
Provider sends an OFFER to Acquirer
Acquirer receives the OFFER from Provider
Acquirer sends a REQUEST to Provider
Provider receives the REQUEST from Acquirer
Provider sends the MATTER to Acquirer
Acquirer acknowledges the receipt of the MATTER
